profile:
Your Cleaning and Commercial Specialists

ServiceMaster of Peterborough Janitorial and Commercial services is your one stop spot for all your cleaning needs.  If you need office cleaning, hard floor maintenance, post construction clean up, carpet and upholstery cleaning, specialized healthcare cleaning or building maintenance we can help! 

At ServiceMaster of Peterborough we can meet the needs of a diverse range of clients. Our staff, have worked in the cleaning and maintenance business for over a decade, and know what it takes to provide exceptional service to our clients. Our goal is to provide exceptional service at a reasonable cost.
